tool_description: TheySay is the #1 data reviews provider. We aggregate reviews from over 100 different web sites covering industries like restaurants, hotels, tourism, health, books,.. Any need you could have for getting information from reviews from any website, we can provide it for you
name: Get Data Reviews
title: Get Data Reviews

api_list.name: Restaurant Detail
api_list.description: Returns all the availabre data of one restaurant
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://munozbosch-get-data-reviews-v1.p.rapidapi.com/restaurants/9"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "munozbosch-get-data-reviews-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://munozbosch-get-data-reviews-v1.p.rapidapi.com/restaurants/{restaurant_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "munozbosch-get-data-reviews-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Restaurant Reviews
api_list.description: Returns an array with all the reviews of one restaurant. Results are paginated.

optional_parameters.name: ordering
optional_parameters.description: ordering: Array's ordering. List of comman separated fields to order by.[text]  Default value: source_date,source_time  Allowed fields: source_date, source_time, rating_global  Modifiers: "-" reverse order.  Example:      &ordering=-rating_global,source_date   //Orders reviews by reverse rating_global and source_date

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: Size of the page. Default value 10, max value 100

optional_parameters.name: min_review_id
optional_parameters.description: Filter reviews by id, returning reviews with id greater than min_review_id

optional_parameters.name: negatives
optional_parameters.description: Filter by negatives reviews. Syntax = "True", "False" Case sensitive, False by default.

optional_parameters.name: positives
optional_parameters.description: Filter by positive reviews. Syntax = "True", "False" Case sensitive, False by default.

optional_parameters.name: neutral
optional_parameters.description: Filter by neutral reviews. Syntax = "True", "False" Case sensitive, False by default.

optional_parameters.name: only_with_comments
optional_parameters.description: Filter by reviews with comments. Syntax = "True", "False" Case sensitive, False by default.

api_list.name: Restaurant Stats
api_list.description: Returns restaurants stats for reviews evolution and review's sentiment distribution. By default returns last 31 days, the period can be changed with start_date and end_date parameters. Max period size is 100 days.

optional_parameters.name: start_date
optional_parameters.description: First day of selected period. Date format DD-MM-YYYY

optional_parameters.name: end_date
optional_parameters.description: Last day of selected period. Date format DD-MM-YYYY

api_list.name: Restaurant Trip Advisor Ranking
api_list.description: Returns restaurant's tripadvisor ranking for a period of time. By default returns last 31 days, the period can be changed with start_date and end_date parameters. Max period size is 100 days.

optional_parameters.name: start_date
optional_parameters.description: First day of selected period. Date format DD-MM-YYYY

optional_parameters.name: end_date
optional_parameters.description: Last day of selected period. Date format DD-MM-YYYY

api_list.name: Restaurant Site Detail
api_list.description: Returns all the availabre data of one restaurant in one site.

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Restaurant Site Stats
api_list.description: Returns restaurant on site stats for reviews evolution and review's sentiment distribution. By default returns last 31 days, the period can be changed with start_date and end_date parameters. Max period size is 100 days.

optional_parameters.name: start_date
optional_parameters.description: First day of selected period. Date format DD-MM-YYYY

optional_parameters.name: end_date
optional_parameters.description: Last day of selected period. Date format DD-MM-YYYY
